ForecastingDisplayedFamily.name: ForecastingDisplayedFamily
ForecastingDisplayedFamily.description: Represents the table in Forecasts Settings where an admin selects the product families that users can forecast on in Lightning Experience.

DisplayPosition.description: The order in which product families are displayed on the forecasts page. Each value is unique to a product family.

ProductFamily.description: The product family available to forecast on. Each product family is unique.
